description:
Lina and others continue their journey to help Zelgadis find "a copy of Claire Bible."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuzaketa Priest! Sono Na wa Xellos!
Le prêtre fou ! (Son nom est Zeross)
Preotul năzdrăvan / Numele lui e Xellos
The Roguish Priest! His Name Is Xellos!
ふざけた神官[プリースト]! その名はゼロス!
